description: An adversary might use WMI to execute commands on a remote system Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: WMI Remote Command Execution
query: (process.executable:*\\WMIC.exe AND process.command_line:*\/node\:* AND process.command_line:*process* AND process.command_line:*call* AND process.command_line:*create*)
